26 June 2021


What Comes Next?




What Comes Next? was the debut album for the band Worst Case Scenario.

On this album, I wrote a number of the song’s instrumentals including Stalemate, A Monument To Your Sins, Chasms, and Sun & Moon.

I also contributed a significant amount to the instrumentals of Terrorist Synthesiser, and It’s Always Sunny In February.


You can listen at the links below.
